chat_history.message:
Hello,
The optical quality of the iPhone does not meet my expectations.
Unfortunately, there is clear damage to the lacquer on the device frame, which does not correspond to the quality feature "Excellent" ("no scratches visible from 20cm")
There is also slight soiling between the buttons and speakers.
When testing & switching the mute button, a little dirt came off. I therefore do not expect intensive cleaning.
I was very satisfied with my last purchase on Backmarket. As the device was in the same quality class, I have a good reference. Unfortunately, there are clear (!) differences in terms of signs of use on the frame when I bought the iPhone.
For this reason, I would like to make use of my right of withdrawal & cancel the purchase.
Yours sincerely.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
